name: Telegram Sender
author: AWENK AUDICO & Partner Coding
description: Sends a message (text, photo, audio, or document) to a specified Telegram chat. Uses global variables for credentials and default chat ID.

properties.label: loc.prop_recipient_override_label
properties.description: Optional. Payload variable containing a Chat ID to override the global setting.

properties.label: loc.prop_file_path_label
properties.description: Optional. Payload variable containing the full path to a photo, audio, or document to send.

output_schema.name: data.telegram_message_id
output_schema.description: The unique ID of the message that was successfully sent.
